sentences.sContent: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.sCn: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.sContent: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.sCn: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.sContent: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.sCn: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

sentences.sContent: ...introduction of American great writers and some excepts from great works like the Old man and the Sea by Hemingway...
...The comments followed the introduction of new limitations on students' right to work during and after their studies...

synos.tran: 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

phrases.pCn: 植物引入，植物引种；引进的植物

remMethod.val: intro(入内) ＋ duct(引导) ＋ ion → 引导入内 → 引进， 介绍

trans.tranOther: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet
